definition: A designated area within a city or town where residential buildings are concentrated, typically characterized by a higher density of housing and limited commercial or industrial activity. It is commonly used to refer to a specific zone or district primarily intended for residential purposes.

examples.english: The residential area is very quiet.

examples.german: In diesem Wohngebiet gibt es viele Grünflächen.
examples.english: There are many green areas in this residential area.

examples.german: Das Wohngebiet ist gut an den öffentlichen Nahverkehr angebunden.
examples.english: The residential area is well connected to public transportation.

examples.german: In dem Wohngebiet gibt es viele Einkaufsmöglichkeiten.
examples.english: There are many shopping options in the residential area.

examples.german: Das Wohngebiet liegt in der Nähe eines Parks.
examples.english: The residential area is located near a park.
